data.rawBody:
--- title: About page excerpt: This is about page. ---

About Me

Hi, there! I'm Arsene Kuo, a frontend designer and developer living in Taipei, Taiwan. After I finished my master's degree in Mechanical Engineering, I worked in manufacture industry and patent firm for years.

With an understanding of user-centered methodologies from my experience in solving manufacture problems, I am eager to encourage interactions among people through digital products. Therefore, I've worked hard to learn and improve my design and coding skill, which allow me to create websites that are intuitive and aesthetically balanced.

In my spare time, I like to relieve myself with music, broaden my horizons with travel, document my journey by photograph, cultivate my taste in denim and heritage menswear, and feed my imagination of impossibility with video games and films.

You may also know more about me through my LinkedIn or Instagram!

Skills

Design

Engineering
